name: Martians Vs Robots
description:
Martians want to regain control of their planet! But we have not yet finished exploiting Martian mining resources... We're going to have to defend ourselves!

To survive this attack we will have to deploy our combat units with the best strategy. We will have to be careful with the different types of enemies, some look tougher than others....
To feed the turrets we will need fossil ores. Start the extraction!

"I would like to die on Mars. But not on impact" Elon Musk



Features:

■ 12 different levels!
■ More than 10 units available!
■ Special Halloween level!
■ Special Christmas level!
■ PC performance test level!
